responsibleFarmer: If you think you are a responsible farmer, join us!
disclaimer: The initiative is part of the project Development of Climate Change Resilient Agriculture (DCCRA), promoted by ASIA Onlus in partnership with Ceapred, Istituto Oikos Onlus and Punto.Sud, funded by the Italian Agency for Development Cooperation.
join: Join SINDHUKA: an added value for your business, a concrete support to local economy. Sindhuka is a trademark which connects local vegetables, fruits and herbal plants producers aligned with sustainable and environmentally friendly production models.
